content: Use the Customize option in filter and add entry for selected headers from source.
creator: davidsk

content: I would like to use any text string that appears in View > Source. Some strings are being displayed by Thunderbird in the Preview window, but the filters do not catch these. For example, I am receiving tons of ads or phishing scams emanating from "Frikicars". "Frikicars" is present in the Preview window, but the filtering does not catch it. Also "User agent" is not accepted as a correct header because of the space character, but some of these messages do use "User agent" with a space character, most likely to evade filtering.
creator: Robert12

content: Maybe if you post a screenshot of the source, someone here may have a suggestion.
creator: davidsk

content: Well, I had expected Frikicars to appear somewhere. Is the reply email of bananasius unique for your typical incoming messages? Or the IP address shown? Or maybe the one of the Received From entries. I am no expert in any way in header records, but I suggest you look for some element that is consistent. Good luck.
creator: davidsk

content: Frikicars appears in plenty of message sources. The question is how to catch text strings from the message source directly. It seems that Thunderbird cannot catch strings from the source directly. This would catch a lot more SPAM.
creator: Robert12

content: Thunderbird works from headers, and can search for text strings within them.
creator: davidsk

content: To my knowledge, the Thunderbird cell phone client has not been released. For now, there should already be an email client on your phone on which you can set up your email account.
creator: davidsk

content:
Ciao, i parametri che si vedono nelle immagini coincidono con quelli che ti ha fornito il tuo provider?

Altrimenti devi procedere con la configurazione manuale facendo click su configura manualmente -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/configurazione-manuale-account
creator: @next

content:
When Thunderbird is installed, it creates a basic profile. You have apparently deleted it. To give Thunderbird a profile, you can press the WIndows key and the 'r' key and in the window that pops up you can enter 

  thunderbird.exe  -p    which will invoke the profile manager. In that, you can click 'create profile', click next, enter a short name for profile, e.g., profile, and then click the browse button to locate and select which of those profiles you want to be the default.
creator: davidsk

content: Cancel my question please. I renamed the existing TB Folders to XXThunderbird and let TB create what it needed to. It launched. ;-)

content: I will add that after about three hours with Frontier"support" (it seemed like a lot more), their conclusion was that it was a problem with Thunderbird and K-9 because they are both owned by the same company.
creator: chuck121

content:
Windows Live Mail usa un formato differente da Thunderbird, per cui ovviamente non basta copiare le cartelle.

Le procedure standard per migrare la posta sono descritte qui -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/passare-thunderbird

Se stai usando una versione recente di Thunderbird, al posto di ImportExportTools devi usare ImportExportTools NG che trovi qui -> https://addons.thunderbird.net/it/thunderbird/addon/importexporttools-ng/
creator: @next

content: You are using a beta and an addon. Beta is widely documented as having bugs and should never be used for day-to-day email. You can pursue your issue at the beta forum: https://thunderbird.topicbox.com/groups/beta
creator: davidsk

content: Hola, Este es el foro en Español, entiendo que si el cambio de horario se dejo de usar en el 2023 entonces se debe modificar el Thunderbird lo cual seria un bug a corregir, en ese caso tendrías que reportarlo en el foro de los desarrolladores (En Ingles) https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/enter_bug.cgi#h=product%7C Luego copiar el caso en este foro para que sirva de guía a otros usuarios ¡Gracias!

content: There is just set of settings, however, you can move folders of messages to Local Folders to keep them accessible.
creator: davidsk

content: If it is an alias, you can add at the account page by clicking 'manage identities.' If it is a real email address, then treat it as it is, a separate and unique email address with a separate account (its own incoming server and its own SMTP server).
creator: davidsk

content: What antivirus software do you use on Windows 10?
creator: wsmwk

content: The intent of a collected addressbook is to collect addresses you don't have in default addressbook so that they are available when writing messages. And Thunderbird is doing exactly that. What you're indicating is that you want to collect the addresses, but not use them, and you're wanting Thunderbird to work differently so you can continue collecting addresses you don't want to use. My suggestion, considering how Thunderbird actually works, is to stop using the collected addressbook and selectively save new email addresses elsewhere, or to periodically review the collected addressbook and purge unwanted ones.
creator: davidsk

content:
I have several address books, but all addresses from all address books show up as suggestions when I start writing a name.

But I want only specific books to be used/not used, depending on the account I am writing an e-mail with.
